title: Baixa press√£o causa instabilidade no interior de SP; veja a previs√£o do tempo
text:

Segundo a Climatempo, em S√£o Carlos o dia deve ser de sol com muitas nuvens e per√≠odos de c√©u nublado. A m√°xima deve atingir os 29¬∞C, em dia de apenas 0,5 mil√≠metro de chuva prevista.
Para o fim de semana, a meteorologia aponta para s√°bado (14) e domingo (15) chuvosos, com volumes que variam entre 7,6 mm e 26,1 mm.
A passagem de uma frente fria deve derrubar as temperaturas. Amanh√£ os term√¥metros devem trabalhar entre 19¬∞C e 25¬∞C; j√° no domingo, a m√≠nima √© de 19¬∞C e a m√°xima de 26¬∞C.
Mais adiante, a previs√£o aponta para uma segunda-feira (16) chuvosa, ter√ßa (17) de garoa e quarta ensolarada. As temperaturas voltam a n√≠veis mais altos na quarta.

author: Curling Canada
title: Homan scores a win during 100th international cap at 2025 LGT World Women's Curling Championship
text:
UIJEONGBU, SOUTH KOREA ‚Äî Rachel Homan‚Äôs latest win at the 2025 LGT World Women‚Äôs Curling Championship was significant for a couple of reasons.
The 8-6 win against Norway‚Äôs Team Marianne Roervik (4-5) elevated Canada to 6-2 in the standings and kept its share of third place in the 13-team field at Uijeongbu Arena. It was also Homan‚Äôs 100th game representing Canada on the international curling scene.
Homan, vice-skip Tracy Fleury, second Emma Miskew, lead Sarah Wilkes, alternate Rachelle Brown and national coaches Viktor Kjell and Ren√©e Sonnenberg earned the win in the 10th end with an open hit for two on Wednesday night.
‚ÄúReally important. We couldn‚Äôt drop that loss for sure. We‚Äôve got a big game against Switzerland tomorrow morning. We just didn‚Äôt capitalize on our opportunities and the game was real close,‚Äù Homan said.
Canada started the game with an early lead and maintained control through the middle ends, but Norway developed a late-game surge that put Team Homan‚Äôs win at risk.
Trailing by three, Norway capitalized in the eighth end after Canada‚Äôs attempt at a corner freeze to create a stagger landed on the nose instead. This left a straight-back angle, giving Norway a short runback for two points, narrowing the gap to just one.
Team Roervik tied the game in the ninth end after fourth Kristin Skaslien executed an exceptional tapback through a narrow port to sit one. Canada attempted a slash for two but missed wide, allowing Norway to score and even the match.
Homan earned her 80th win in 100 international games played and ranks second behind Jennifer Jones (112 games played, 87 wins) among able-bodies Canadian women‚Äôs curlers.
Canadian wheelchair curler Ina Forrest has the most Canadian caps among women‚Äôs curlers, with 204 games played at World Wheelchair Championship events and Paralympic Games.
The 35-year-old skip made her debut representing Canada at the 2010 World Junior Curling Championships, winning silver. Now, she‚Äôs competing at the World Women‚Äôs Curling Championship for the fifth time in her career, having already earned two golds, one silver, and one bronze at the event. Homan has also represented Canada at the Olympic Winter Games twice ‚Äî in women‚Äôs curling in 2018 and in mixed doubles in 2022 ‚Äî and earlier this season, she added a Pan Continental Curling Championship gold to her accomplishments.
‚ÄúLook at that. If only I was 100-0,‚Äù Homan joked. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm always happy to represent Canada and I‚Äôm glad I‚Äôve been able to play that many games for Canada.‚Äù
Canada had an unconventional force in a first end that featured just about everything. It started when Miskew‚Äôs takeout picked and took a 90-degree turn to the boards. Later, Canada attempted a takeout to sit two, but jammed on a stone behind the house, leaving a Norway stone in play. Norway missed its final two shots, first a flashed takeout and then stuck around on the blank attempt for a single point.
In the second end, Team Homan had several counters on the wings but couldn‚Äôt get them into play due to a well-placed draw by Norway. Canada took a single, but then stole three in the third. Homan nailed a hit-and-roll behind cover and forced Norway into a difficult come around. Team Roervik was light and over-curled, wrecking on the front Canadian counter.
Canada maintained firm control throughout much of the game and didn‚Äôt need to take risks. They scored single points in the fifth and seventh ends while holding Norway to just one point in both the fourth and sixth ends.
Team Homan plays its last of three straight split days in South Korea on Thursday. First, it takes on undefeated Team Silvana Tirinzoni of Switzerland (8-0) on Wednesday night at 8 p.m. (all times ET), followed by a game against Japan‚Äôs Team Sayaka Yoshimura (3-5) at 6 a.m. on Thursday.
In other Draw 14 games, China‚Äôs Team Rui Wang (5-3) earned an 8-2 win against Lithuania‚Äôs Team Virginija Paulauskaite (0-9); Sweden‚Äôs Team Anna Hasselborg (6-2) defeated Italy‚Äôs Team Stefania Constantini (3-6) with a 7-6 win; and Scotland‚Äôs Team Sophie Jackson (5-4) improved with a 6-5 win against Japan‚Äôs Team Yoshimura.
For Team Canada updates, go to www.curling.ca. Follow us on X, Instagram, Facebook and TikTok.
For live scoring, standings, and statistics, click here.
TSN, Curling Canada‚Äôs Season of Champions broadcast partner, will provide live coverage of all Canadian round-robin games and playoff games. Click here for the full broadcast schedule.
Non-Canadian round-robin games are available through World Curling‚Äôs streaming platform, The Curling Channel.
This story will be available in French as soon as possible here.
-30-

author: Portia Arthur
title: Berla Mundi: TV3 Presenter Looks Glamorous In A Classy Customised Gown For Her Private Wedding - YEN.COM.GH
text: Berla Mundi: TV3 Presenter Looks Glamorous In A Classy Customised Gown For Her Private Wedding - Television personality Berla Mundi wants to break the internet with her fabulous outfit for her traditional wedding - The beauty goddess looked ethereal in a stunning kente outfit and beautiful hairstyle for the private event - Some social media users have commented on Berla Mundi's elegant wedding photos PAY ATTENTION: [YEN Entertainment Awards 2023 VOTING is officially underway!](https://corp.yen.com.gh/yen-awards#) Ghanaian media personality [Berla Mundi](https://yen.com.gh/tags/berla-mundi/) has tied the knot in a breathtaking ensemble with a few celebrities, family and friends in attendance. The TV3 presenter looked charming in a custom-made outfit that made her glow for her private ceremony on January 5, 2024. Berla Mundi has inspired many women planning to walk down the aisle in 2024 with her elegant bridal hairstyle and flawless makeup as she recited her marital vows. Check out [Giovani Caleb](https://twitter.com/GiovaniCaleb/status/1743317745008042340)'s tweet below; Berla Mundi slays in a shiny, ruched dress The Day Show host Berla Mundi looked gorgeous in a two-tone dress and frontal curly hairstyle as she interviewed exceptional Ghanaians doing amazing things in different industries. Check out the [photos](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1h1ludoORX/?img_index=1) below; Berla Mundi Rocks Kira jacket And Bubble Skirt, Resembles Jordin Sparks In New Photos Earlier, YEN.com.gh wrote about [Berla Mundi](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/style/243729-berla-mundi-tv3-presenter-rocks-kira-jacket-bubble-skirt-resembles-jordin-sparks-photos/)'s elegant outfit for her new photoshoot. The morning show presenter donned a showy silky skirt and a black blazer with distinctive embroidery. Some female style influencers like Anita Akuffo, Lydia Forson, and Selly Galley have commented on Berla Mundi's post. Berla Mundi Goes Viral As She Flaunts Her Cleavage In A Shiny Flared Gown With Hoodie To Host Event Previously, YEN.com.gh wrote about [Berla Mundi](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/style/232964-2023-vgma-berla-mundi-rocks-a-shiny-flared-gown-hoodie-hosts-music-award-fourth-time/), one of the most gifted media figures and event presenters. Berla Mundi's wedding: David Tabi wins over Ghanaians with his classy outfits and beard in viral videos Berla Mundi wore custom clothing and an adorable haircut, making her appear stunning as she presented the Vodafone [Ghana Music](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/music/) Awards. The fashion influencer attended the largest music festival, honouring exceptional musicians with immaculate makeup.
